top_categories.workout_context: Iceman Cometh's Michigan singletrack, Mountain bike forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 30 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Iceman Cometh's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before November.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Iceman Cometh, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
When someone attacks on Michigan mountain bike singletrack, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
2-minute all-out efforts on Michigan mountain bike singletrack. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.
Smooth pedaling at 30 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.
30 miles on Michigan mountain bike singletrack burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
67ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At Iceman Cometh, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Iceman Cometh. Train it until it feels boring.
Varied gradients on Michigan mountain bike singletrack demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Long rides with hard efforts mixed in. Simulates what Iceman Cometh's Michigan mountain bike singletrack actually does to you.

race_overlay.nutrition: Standard hydration and fueling. One bottle per hour minimum. Gel or bar every 45 minutes at race intensity.
race_overlay.terrain: Highly technical terrain at Iceman Cometh demands practice on similar surfaces. Ride michigan mountain bike singletrack at race-day cadence weekly. Expect: michigan singletrack, mountain bike, 30-mile distance. Practice cornering, descending, and power delivery on unstable surfaces. Dial in tire pressure before race week — 5 PSI wrong costs you 15+ minutes over 30 miles.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and Critical Power to prepare you for 30 miles of michigan mountain bike singletrack in Kalkaska, Michigan.
